name: Engage Rate Boost
author: BiHV

sections.description:
Engage Rate Boosts is a powerful WordPress plugin that allows you to add customizable rating and comments settings to your website. Enhance user interaction by providing a seamless and configurable rating system. This plugin includes support for Google reCAPTCHA to prevent spam and ensure genuine feedback.

Features:

  • Customizable rating labels and messages
  • Google reCAPTCHA integration for spam protection
  • Customizable modal header background and text colors
  • Easy-to-use settings page in the WordPress admin area
  • Premium features available for advanced customization

How to Use:

  1. Install and activate the plugin.
  2. Navigate to the \”Rating Settings\” page in the WordPress admin menu.
  3. Configure the rating labels, messages, and colors as per your requirements.
  4. Enable Google reCAPTCHA by providing your site key.
  5. Save the changes and enjoy a customized rating and comments system on your website.

Premium Features:

  • Advanced customization options
  • Additional settings for enhanced user experience
  • Detect the negative comment and sent email notify to admin/author
  • Hide negative comment and waiting admin/author approve
  • Config Google Captcha
  • Priority support

Upgrade to the premium version to unlock all features and take full control of your rating and comments system.

Requirements:

  • WordPress 2.7 or higher
  • PHP 5.3 or higher

Third-Party Services:

This plugin relies on the following third-party services:
– Google reCAPTCHA: Used for spam protection in the rating and comments system. For more information, please visit the Google reCAPTCHA site and review their terms of use and privacy policies.
– Google Translate API: Used for translation purposes. For more information, please visit the Google Translate API site and review their privacy & terms of use.
– NoCodeFunctions API: Used for sentiment analysis of comments. For more information, please visit the NoCodeFunctions API site and review their privacy & terms of use.

For more information and support, please visit our support page.
sections.installation:
From the WordPress Dashboard
1. Log in to your WordPress admin area.
2. Navigate to Plugins > Add New.
3. Search for \”Engage Rate Boosts\”.
4. Click \”Install Now\” next to the plugin.
5. After the installation is complete, click \”Activate\” to activate the plugin.

Manual Installation
1. Download the plugin ZIP file.
2. Log in to your WordPress admin area.
3. Navigate to Plugins > Add New.
4. Click the \”Upload Plugin\” button at the top of the page.
5. Click \”Choose File\” and select the downloaded ZIP file.
6. Click \”Install Now\”.
7. After the installation is complete, click \”Activate Plugin\” to activate the plugin.

Using FTP
1. Download the plugin ZIP file and extract it to your computer.
2. Connect to your web server using an FTP client.
3. Navigate to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
4. Upload the extracted plugin folder to this directory.
5. Log in to your WordPress admin area.
6. Navigate to Plugins > Installed Plugins.
7. Find \”Engage Rate Boosts\” in the list and click \”Activate\”.

Post-Installation Setup
1. Navigate to the \”ERB Settings\” page under Settings menu.
2. Configure the rating labels, messages, and colors as per your requirements.
3. Enable Google reCAPTCHA by providing your site key if needed.
4. Save the changes.
5. Install a plugin like FluentSMTP to enable email SMTP and allow sending emails.

Your \”Engage Rate Boosts\” plugin is now installed and ready to use. Enjoy a customizable rating and comments system on your website!
sections.faq:
Q1: How do I install the Engage Rate Boosts plugin?
A1: You can install the plugin directly from the WordPress dashboard by navigating to Plugins > Add New, searching for \”Engage Rate Boosts,\” and clicking \”Install Now.\” Alternatively, you can manually upload the plugin ZIP file via the \”Upload Plugin\” button or using an FTP client. Detailed installation instructions are provided in the plugin documentation.

Q2: How do I configure the rating labels and messages?
A2: After activating the plugin, navigate to the \”Rating Settings\” page in the WordPress admin menu. Here, you can customize the rating labels, success and failure messages, and other settings. Make sure to save your changes.

Q3: How do I enable Google reCAPTCHA for my rating system?
A3: To enable Google reCAPTCHA, go to the \”Rating Settings\” page and find the \”Google Captcha Enabled?\” option. Check the box to enable it and enter your Google reCAPTCHA site key in the provided field. Save your changes to apply the settings.

Q4: Can I customize the colors of the modal header?
A4: Yes, you can customize the modal header background and text colors. Navigate to the \”Rating Settings\” page and find the options for \”Modal Header Background Color\” and \”Modal Header Text Color.\” Use the color picker to select your desired colors and save the changes.

Q5: What are the premium features of this plugin?
A5: The premium version of the plugin offers advanced customization options, additional settings for enhanced user experience, and priority support. You can upgrade to the premium version to unlock all features and take full control of your rating and comments system.

Q6: What is the minimum WordPress version required for this plugin?
A6: The minimum required WordPress version for this plugin is 2.7.0.

Q7: What is the minimum PHP version required for this plugin?
A7: The minimum required PHP version for this plugin is 5.3.

Q8: How can I get support for this plugin?
A8: For support, please visit our support page or contact us through the WordPress support forums. Premium users can access priority support through the premium support channels.

Q9: How do I upgrade to the premium version?
A9: To upgrade to the premium version, navigate to the \”Rating Settings\” page and look for the upgrade link. Click the link to visit the upgrade page and follow the instructions to purchase and activate the premium features.

short_description: A plugin to add customizable rating and comments settings with Google reCAPTCHA support.
